description: Grimsby Town sign former Morecambe forward Arthur Gnahoua on a one-year deal after a successful trial.
title: Arthur Gnahoua: Grimsby sign former Morecambe forward on one-year deal
title_page: Arthur Gnahoua: Grimsby sign former Morecambe forward on one-year deal - BBC Sport
maintext:
Grimsby Town have signed former Morecambe forward Arthur Gnahoua on a one-year deal after a successful trial.
The 31-year-old was released by the Shrimps at the end of last season after two seasons with the Lancashire side.
He previously worked with Mariners boss Paul Hurst during a spell at Shrewsbury.
"I know how the gaffer works so I'm happy to be here and I'm looking forward to working with him," he told the club website., external
